channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: A Fly-tip Large - More than 10 black bags problem has been found, 12th February

item.category: Fly-tip Large - More than a van load (Estates)

item.title: Street Cleaning, 12th February
item.description:
It seems that the road has not been cleaned for some time - litter, fox fouling, debris etc everywhere. Can you please ensure the cleaning schedule is adhered to? It must also be tracked that cleaning actually takes place during scheduled cleanings.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wiverton Road, Penge, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Protruding drain cover, 12th February
item.description:
Drain cover sticks out and is surrounded by a hole. It has been like this for some time and is gradually getting worse.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Streatham Hill, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lime bikes blocking pavement at jn of Baker Street/allsop place, 12th February
item.description:
Lime bikes blocking pavement and human forest overcrowded at jn of allsop place/Baker Street opposite to the volunteer pub causing nuisance for pedestrians who crossing traffic light.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Outer Circle, Marylebone, City of Westminster

item.title: Fly tipping, 12th February
item.description:
Outside Sainsbury’s Lordship Lane - second time, at least. Please check for addresses. This is illegal and unacceptable.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 373, Lordship Lane, East Dulwich, Greater London

item.title: Excessive construction and household waste in garden, 12th February
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Brooke Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Problem not solved, 12th February
item.description:

item.title: Human poo, 12th February
item.description:
There was no option to put human poo. I think you need to add it because it’s happening a lot around this area lately. Please come and clean this as soon as possible because it is absolutely disgusting and health hazard.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Richmond Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Disgusting amount of fly tipping, 12th February
item.description:
Absolutely disgraceful amounts of dumped rubbish causing a blight on the area and no doubt attracting vermin Please remove ASAP!

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Herbert Road, Woolwich
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Posts still not replaced, 12th February
item.description:
As reported earlier there are at least 7 posts that have been removed or knocked down along the verge this is allowing cars and vans access to drive on the verge and since the double yellow lines were installed the problem is getting worse the verge is now being destroyed there was one post replaced so maybe you are patting yourself on the back but you have not solved the issue
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cray Avenue, Poverest, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead fox on foot path, 12th February
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Danson Road, Blendon, Greater London
